benzene.guidance:
Very high levels of Benzene detected, significantly above safe limits. Immediate action recommended to reduce exposure. Consider evacuation of the area until levels decrease. Consult with health professionals.

Personalized recommendations:
- Your sensitivity profile indicates moderately elevated sensitivity to Benzene. You may experience effects at lower concentrations than the general population.
benzene.standard_guidance: SEVERE: Benzene at potentially hazardous levels. Immediate evacuation recommended. Ventilate area thoroughly before re-entry. Seek medical attention if symptoms develop. Emergency services should be notified for severe exposure events.
